title: #081 - How to get more quality followers on Instagram

description:
Before I share my step-by-step outline of how to get more quality followers on Instagram, I just want to remind you that registration for Project Storyline closes tomorrow! Don‚Äôt let this EPIC opportunity pass you by! üò±

Okay - now time for a confession.

I used to be OBSESSED with how many people were following me, and I used to give it more attention than how much I was profiting. Seems backwards right? As a business owner, why obsess more over how many followers you have vs. how much money you‚Äôre making?

Thankfully, things are different now. I‚Äôm no longer concerned with how many people are following me, instead I‚Äôm concerned with the depth of my relationship with my following. Because while followers does not equal sales, the depth of my relationship with my following makes sales a hell of a lot easier.

I‚Äôve narrowed down what I believe is the best way to grow your Instagram following in 2019 (because yes, the platforms are always changing, so keep up). On this week‚Äôs episode of On Purpose, I talk about where to focus your attention so that you can create and grow a captive audience. ¬†

Tomorrow, the fun will come to an end unless you sign up for Project Storyline.

Project Storyline empowers you to show up more consistently and strategically on your Instagram Stories by helping you know exactly what to post. Don‚Äôt procrastinate because we‚Äôre going to be closing Project Storyline TOMORROW and it won‚Äôt be re-opening until next year.

You need to get your message out there to the world so that you can start making the impact you know you were born to make.
